Article 2 col - image left text right.body:
article.article
  .container
    h1 ${3:title}
    .row.image-left-text-right
      .col-md-6
        = image_tag(${1:image}, alt: '${2:description}', class: 'img-fluid')
      .col-md-6
        p ${0:content}
